Address.value: 1717 MAIN STREET,SUITE 2000, DALLAS, Texas, 75201, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Invitation Homes owns a portfolio of over 82,000 single-family rental homes. The company focuses on owning homes in the starter and move-up segments of the housing market with an average sale price around $300,000 and generally less than 1,800 square feet. The portfolio is spread across 16 target markets that feature high employment and household formation growth with nearly 70% of the portfolio in the Western U.S. and Florida; 15 of the 16 markets featuring average rents lower than homeownership costs.
